title: DigiServices
author: DigiServices
content: Hey there,we have crypto for sale.BTC, USDT, USDC, ETHWe want Paypal, Revolut, Skrill or Instant Sepa.Any kind of currency (EUR, USD, CHF, GBP)Rates beetween 5 - 12% depending on the amount.Minimum: 50$Deal and rates will be arranged dependin on paymet method and quantity. Trusted members get better rate.Trade is fast from 15 minutes to max 2 hours.Contact me on telegram:https://t.me/Digi_KeyzOr pm me on the forum.

comments.author: BitSwapNow
comments.body: You can check out our service as we offer buy/sell of crypto for bank transfers ect.

comments.author: netinfra
comments.body: Quote from: BitSwapNow on November 29, 2022, 11:17:04 PMYou can check out our service as we offer buy/sell of crypto for bank transfers ect. I've been reading in the faq of your service that "maybe" you can ask for the accreditation of our identity (KYC) if it is requested by your partner (simplex)? So, although your service clearly states that no document will be requested for the purchase of coins, this will not actually be the case in most cases (mainly european union citizens), right? Obviously, if this is the case, it is clearly a kind of backdoor scam, since in fact the identity will be claimed by means of legal accreditation.

comments.author: DigiServices
comments.body: For who need escrow, profile on paxful is available
